participant_1.background:
I spent quality time with my children and avoided the obligations of social obligations.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
I played my guitar to my cat before bed last night.
i sew my own clothes.
I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to.

participant_2.background:
My family is the most important thing in my life.
my parents have been married for 40 years.
i am fascinated with ghosts.
i drink beers and go to the creek.
I enjoy strong female characters in my movies.

content.text: I'm good! I just spent some time with my kids and avoided social obligations. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! My family is the most important thing to me, too.  My parents have been married for 40 years.  What are your favorite things to do with your kids?
We like to play games, go to the park, and read books together.  I also like to sew clothes for them.  What are some of your hobbies?
I like to go to the creek and drink beers with my friends.  I'm also fascinated by ghosts and love strong female characters in movies.

That sounds like a lot of fun!  I'm not much of a drinker, but I do enjoy going to the creek.  I've never seen a ghost, but I'm always open to the possibility!  I also love strong female characters in movies.  Who are some of your favorites?

I love Sigourney Weaver in the Alien movies.  She's so badass!  I also love Katherine Hepburn in The African Queen.  She's such a strong and independent woman.  What are some of your favorite strong female characters?

I love Ellen Ripley in the Alien movies too!  She's such an amazing heroine.  I also love Sarah Connor in the Terminator movies.  She's so tough and determined.  I think strong female characters are so important in movies.  They show girls that they can be anything they want to be.
I agree!  Strong female characters are so inspiring.  They show girls that they can be strong and independent, even in the face of adversity.
